attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day there is a new report of sleeze in one way or another involving politicians.They all seem to be feathering their own nests, at the expence of the over burdened tax payer.

I like many, do not trust politicians and feel that there is corruption at the highest levels.

I therefore suggest that the titles 'Right Honourable' and 'Honourable'be abolished. I do not believe that any MP deserves to be addressed as such.

It should not be too difficult for this Government to do. After all they have dropped many British traditions already.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
